One time with Cyprien we had to make a video for Cyprien gaming
For the game Disney infinity

It was a traditional gameplay like the one

for a brand, people from the brand where in the studio with us
and so they always did a debrief before : "if you need to hilight something
it would be that, don't talk about that." At that time it wasn't like today
